articles.title: Photos from Boston’s ‘ICE Out Everywhere’ protest
articles.description:
More than a thousand people braved the cold at Boston Common on Saturday to demonstrate against Trump's immigration policy.

The post Photos from Boston’s ‘ICE Out Everywhere’ protest appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Over a thousand protesters gathered at Boston Common on Saturday against Trump's immigration policy.
The 'ICE Out Everywhere' protest highlighted local opposition to federal immigration enforcement.
Demonstrators aimed to raise awareness about the impact of immigration policies on Boston communities.

articles.title: Insider believes Red Sox have ‘another move in them’ this offseason to improve infield
articles.description:
While pitchers and catchers report for spring training in less than two weeks, multiple reports indicate that the Red Sox might make another move.

The post Insider believes Red Sox have ‘another move in them’ this offseason to improve infield appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox may make another infield move before spring training starts on February 15.
Insider reports suggest potential trades to enhance team performance this offseason.
Improved infield could boost Red Sox competitiveness for Boston fans in 2024 season.
